question:
Consider the following statements about "Kayakalp" programme:
  1. It is an initiative of Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
  2. The programme promotes hygiene and infection control practices in public health care facilities
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
The "Kayakalp" initiative encourages every public health facility in the country to work towards standards of excellence to help the facilities stay clean and hygienic.
